rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
智能手机应用程序可提高患者的保留率并减少阿片类药物的使用德克萨斯大学圣安东尼奥健康科学中心（UT Health San Antonio）的一项新研究表明，使用智能手机应用程序作为支持疗法并结合药物治疗时，阿片类药物使用障碍患者可以减少阿片类药物的使用天数并延长治疗时间显示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Smartphone-app-enhances-retention-and-reduces-opioid-use-in-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Smartphone-app-enhances-retention-and-reduces-opioid-use-in-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=690ac249-4da7-4482-b54d-29aed3e2582f Mon, 30 Dec 2024 21:23:19 -0500 Smartphone app enhances retention and reduces opioid use in patients
研究揭示肾脏在高原适应中的作用皇家山大学生理学家和他的团队的一项研究证明了肾脏在适应高海拔方面的关键作用，并说明了夏尔巴人更好地适应高海拔攀登的另一种方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Study-reveals-role-of-kidneys-in-high-altitude-acclimatization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Study-reveals-role-of-kidneys-in-high-altitude-acclimatization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4be200a-fd4e-45d2-ba02-6074acb9a3dc Mon, 30 Dec 2024 21:18:13 -0500 Study reveals role of kidneys in high altitude acclimatization
医院并购很少能提高医疗保健价值或降低价格根据《美国外科医生学会杂志》(JACS) 发表的一项研究，美国医院和卫生系统的合并和收购很少能提高医疗服务质量或降低医疗保健成本和价格。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Hospital-mergers-and-acquisitions-rarely-improve-health-care-value-or-reduce-prices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Hospital-mergers-and-acquisitions-rarely-improve-health-care-value-or-reduce-prices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79ef3787-ae5f-43f0-be55-6545bfc4546c Mon, 30 Dec 2024 21:14:39 -0500 Hospital mergers and acquisitions rarely improve health care value or reduce prices
喝咖啡和茶可以预防头颈癌在对十多项研究数据进行的一项新分析中，咖啡和茶的摄入与患头颈癌（包括口腔癌和咽喉癌）的风险降低有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Coffee-and-tea-conspiration-may-protect-against-head-and-neck-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Coffee-and-tea-conspiration-may-protect-against-head-and-neck-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=242e55c3-4959-476e-b488-2c21f4cc469d Mon, 30 Dec 2024 21:09:52 -0500 Coffee and tea consumption may protect against head and neck cancers
青少年的大脑结构差异可能在早期开始物质使用中发挥作用美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 资助的一项针对近 10,000 名青少年的研究发现，15 岁之前使用过物质的青少年与不使用物质的青少年的大脑结构存在明显差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Structural-brain-differences-in-adolescents-may-play-a-role-in-early-initiation-of-substance-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Structural-brain-differences-in-adolescents-may-play-a-role-in-early-initiation-of-substance-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=538d399a-bbeb-433f-a57a-55a1926ed7cb Mon, 30 Dec 2024 20:59:57 -0500 Structural brain differences in adolescents may play a role in early initiation of substance use
直接面向消费者的癌症风险基因检测的潜在危险2024 年 12 月 24 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新社论，题为“FDA 批准的种系癌症易感性测试的陷阱和危险”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Potential-dangers-of-direct-to-consumer-genic-test-for-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Potential-dangers-of-direct-to-consumer-genic-test-for-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ad7a7d9-3ae2-437d-af3a-6b872d289f77 Mon, 30 Dec 2024 20:54:29 -0500 Potential dangers of direct-to-consumer genetic test for cancer risk
重新思考微生物组在年龄相关性骨质流失中的作用骨质疏松症是全世界的一个主要健康问题，特别是在老龄化人口中。尽管药理学取得了进步，但副作用、成本和可及性有限等挑战降低了治疗的依从性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Rethinking-the-role-of-microbiome-in-age-lated-bone-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Rethinking-the-role-of-microbiome-in-age-lated-bone-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4d34251-beb1-4812-b495-54d86e33eb2c Mon, 30 Dec 2024 20:47:24 -0500 Rethinking the role of microbiome in age-related bone loss
推进拉曼显微镜对生物样品的高分辨率成像了解构成我们身体的分子和细胞的行为对于医学的进步至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Advancing-Raman-microscopy-for-high-resolution-imaging-of-biological-samples.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Advancing-Raman-microscopy-for-high-resolution-imaging-of-biological-samples.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=543b76f2-d539-415d-86fd-ea1082bd1e72 Mon, 30 Dec 2024 20:44:11 -0500 Advancing Raman microscopy for high-resolution imaging of biological samples
FC428克隆的出现和头孢曲松耐药淋病的全球传播导致性传播感染淋病的淋病奈瑟菌正变得越来越难以治疗，因为该病原体已经对多种抗生素产生了耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Emergence-of-FC428-clone-and-the-global-spread-of-ceftriaxone-resistance-gonorrea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Emergence-of-FC428-clone-and-the-global-spread-of-ceftriaxone-resistance-gonorrea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63b2e65d-191d-438f-b735-98166e0eb690 Mon, 30 Dec 2024 20:40:36 -0500 Emergence of FC428 clone and the global spread of ceftriaxone-resistant gonorrhea
Kewaunee 和 NuAire：市场领导者联手革新行业NuAire 加入 Kewaunee Scientific Corporation，通过全面的培养箱、通风柜和生物安全柜产品组合增强实验室解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Kewaunee-NuAire-Market-Leaders-Join-Forces-to-Revolutionize-the-Industry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Kewaunee-NuAire-Market-Leaders-Join-Forces-to-Revolutionize-the-Industry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29436644-0fe2-4a3c-811b-b75c168b2df1 Mon, 30 Dec 2024 10:16:00 -0500 Kewaunee & NuAire: Market Leaders Join Forces to Revolutionize the Industry
